message.entry: Invalid data type. First argument must be a numeric or logical array, a table, or a timetable.
Table variables must be numeric.
Invalid data type. Complex inputs must be double or single arrays.
Smoothing method must be ''movmean'', ''movmedian'', ''gaussian'', ''lowess'', ''loess'', ''rlowess'', ''rloess'', or ''sgolay''.
Window length must be a positive numeric or duration scalar or a 2-element numeric or duration vector.
NaN condition must be ''omitnan'', ''includenan'', ''omitmissing'' or ''includemissing''.
''SamplePoints'' value must be a numeric, datetime, or duration vector.
''SmoothingFactor'' value must be a numeric scalar between 0 and 1.
Parameter name must be ''SamplePoints'' or ''SmoothingFactor''.
Parameter name must be ''SamplePoints'', ''SmoothingFactor'', ''DataVariables'', or ''ReplaceValues''.
Parameter name must be ''SamplePoints'', ''SmoothingFactor'', or ''Degree''.
Parameter name must be ''SamplePoints'', ''SmoothingFactor'', ''DataVariables'', ''ReplaceValues'', or ''Degree''.
Method must come before Name-Value pairs.
NaN condition must come before Name-Value pairs.
Invalid option combination. Specify NaN condition once.
Incorrect number of input arguments. ''{0}'' must be followed by a corresponding value.
''SmoothingFactor'' is not supported when the window length is specified.
Invalid data type. Window length must be a duration if the ''SamplePoints'' values are {0}.
Invalid data type. Window length must be numeric if the ''SamplePoints'' values are numeric or if ''SamplePoints'' are not specified.
Window length must be real.
Window length must be finite.
{0} value must be real.
{0} value must be finite.
Sparse ''SamplePoints'' values are not supported.
''SamplePoints'' value must be a vector of the same length as the input argument.
{0} values must be unique.
{0} values must be sorted in ascending order.
''Degree'' value must be a positive integer.
''Degree'' value is only supported when the method is 'sgolay'.
''Degree'' value was larger than the maximum number of points in any window ({0,number,integer}) and was decreased to {1,number,integer}.
''Degree'' value must be less than the largest number of points in any window ({0,number,integer}).
Dimension is not supported when first argument is a table or timetable.
''DataVariables'' parameter is only supported for table and timetable inputs.
''ReplaceValues'' parameter is only supported for table and timetable inputs.
''DataVariables'' function handle must return a logical scalar.
Invalid ''DataVariables'' value.
''SamplePoints'' parameter is not supported for timetable inputs.
Weighting indicator must be a scalar logical.
Dimensions of robust weights must match the dimensions of the input array.
Gaussian width must be a positive scalar.
{0} must be full.
Invalid data type. First argument must be a numeric or logical array, or a table.
Window size must be specified for complex data in code generation.
Method argument must be constant for code generation.
Window size must be specified for code generation if sample points are datetimes.
